org.corfudb.universe.node.server.vm

Class VmCorfuServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.universe.node.server.AbstractCorfuServer<VmCorfuServerParams,VmUniverseParams>
      • org.corfudb.universe.node.server.vm.VmCorfuServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<CorfuServer>, Node, CorfuServer

    public class VmCorfuServer
extends AbstractCorfuServer<VmCorfuServerParams,VmUniverseParams>
    Implements a CorfuServer instance that is running on VM.

      CorfuServer deploy()
      Deploys a Corfu server on the VM as specified, including the following steps: a) Copy the corfu jar file under the working directory to the VM b) Run that jar file using java on the VM

    • Method Detail

      • deploy

        public CorfuServer deploy()
        Deploys a Corfu server on the VM as specified, including the following steps: a) Copy the corfu jar file under the working directory to the VM b) Run that jar file using java on the VM
        Returns:
        current instance of the Node with the new state.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Symmetrically disconnect the server from the cluster, which creates a complete partition.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect(List<CorfuServer> servers)
        Symmetrically disconnect a server from a list of other servers, which creates a partial partition.
        Parameters:
        servers - List of servers to disconnect from

      • pause

        Pause the CorfuServer process on the VM

        public void stop(Duration timeout)
        Description copied from interface: Node
        Stops a Node gracefully within the timeout provided to this method.
        Parameters:
        timeout - a limit within which the method attempts to gracefully stop the CorfuServer.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroy the CorfuServer by killing the process and removing the files
        Throws:
        NodeException - this exception will be thrown if the server can not be destroyed.
